quotes.quote: Trying to manage a project without project management is like trying to play a football game without a game plan.
A project is complete when it starts working for you, rather than you working for it.
If you have never recommended canceling a project, you haven’t been an effective project manager.

In poorly run projects, problems can go undetected until the project fails. It's like the drip.. drip.. drip of a leaky underground pipe. Money is being lost, but you don't see it until there is an explosion.
To get a project off the ground, tell a colleague it was their idea. They will put their heart and soul into making it successful.
How does a project get to be a year late? One day at a time.
True success not a project but a journey
No matter how good the team or how efficient the methodology, if we're not solving the right problem, the project fails.
You are an endless project... changing, evolving, surprising.
The middle of every successful project looks like a disaster.
I've learned over the years that when I go to that place of passion within me, there's no force in the universe that can interfere with my completing a project.
In any project, the most important factor is the belief in success. Without faith, success is impossible.
A project without a critical path is like a ship without a rudder.
Projects progress quickly until they become 90% complete, then remain 90% complete forever.
A good plan can help with risk analyses but it will never guarantee the smooth running of the project.
I don't take any project lightly. Every project is important for me. In fact, every scene in every film is important.
If an IT project works the first time, it was a very small and simple project.
My personal philosophy is not to undertake a project unless it is manifestly important and nearly impossible.
No major project is ever installed on time, within budget, with the same staff that started it.
Find a happy person, and you will find a project
Projects are determined by missions, the project is great if it has a great mission.
Bad leaders believe that they have to project control at all times.
Every time you do a project, you learn something new.
Every project starts with a story
The road is long from the project to its completion.
Running a project without a WBS is like going to a strange land without a roadmap.
Beware the time-driven project with an artificial deadline.
